data.title: The 15 Year Old Girl
data.text:
1989 film

The 15 Year Old GirlDirected byJacques DoillonWritten byJacques DoillonProduced byYannick BernardStarringJudith GodrècheCinematographyCaroline Champetier

Release date

Running time

86 minutesCountryFranceLanguageFrench

The 15 Year Old Girl (French: La Fille de 15 ans) is a 1989 French drama film directed by Jacques Doillon. The plot is about a teenage girl falling in love with the father of her boyfriend. It was entered into the 16th Moscow International Film Festival.[1]

Cast

[edit]

Judith Godrèche as Juliette

Melvil Poupaud as Thomas

Jacques Doillon as Willy

Sexual misconduct allegations

[edit]

In 2024, Judith Godrèche accused Jacques Doillon of raping her on the set of this film.[2]
